title: President Odile Renaud-Basso
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the President of the EBRD, an office she has held since 2020.

title: Odile Renaud-Basso assumes office as EBRD president
snippet: Ms Renaud-Basso said: “Today is the beginning of a new chapter for me and for the EBRD. These are challenging times and I have been hugely impressed by the Bank’s delivery to help our countries of operations and our clients deal with the ...

title: 2024 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD Board of Governors re-elected Odile Renaud-Basso to serve a second term as the Bank’s President on 16 May 2024.

title: EBRD Governors re-elect President Odile Renaud-Basso for a second term
snippet: The Board of Governors of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) has today re-elected Odile Renaud-Basso to serve a second term as the Bank’s President.

title: Former EBRD President Sir Suma Chakrabarti
snippet: Sir Suma Chakrabarti was President of the Bank from 2012-2020.
